news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: ProducePay, after securing a $38 million funding, is focusing on enhancing the fresh produce supply chain through growth, partnerships, and tackling industry challenges. Additionally, the company launched a visibility solution aimed at improving transparency and reducing waste in the supply chain.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: ProducePay Inc., EnviroKure, Incorporated, Steward, Sound Agriculture, and DeHaat operate in the sustainable agriculture and agri-tech sector. EnviroKure, Steward, Sound Agriculture, and DeHaat focus on innovative agricultural technologies to enhance plant growth, improve crop yields, and promote sustainable farming practices. Simply Good Jars, on the other hand, aims to foster a connection between local growers and consumers by making healthy choices more accessible.

overview_description.description: ProducePay is an AgTech company that develops a financing platform to provide the agricultural industry with financial resources. It provides farmers with immediate access to liquidity and financing in addition to real-time data for pricing transparency and connections to other key players in the field. Its platform also allows farmers to access custom-made cash flow services and expand their businesses.

about_short_description.short_description: ProducePay is an AgTech company developing a financing platform that allows farmers to have access to liquidity for pricing transparency.

product.name: Quick-Pay
product.description: A financial solution offering faster payments on invoices with flexible terms to support business expansion.

product.name: Pre-Season
product.description: Provides working capital for businesses to invest in growth, with terms tailored to their needs.

product.name: Trading Platform
product.description: Facilitates high-quality trades through a global network of verified buyers and sellers.

product.name: Predictable Commerce Programs
product.description: Connects growers, marketers, and retailers to ensure a consistent 52-week supply.

product.name: Market Intelligence
product.description: Offers real-time data and insights to help navigate the volatile produce industry.
